MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno affecting properties in Newmills Street and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5.15pm due to an electrical pillar fault on Newmills Road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional work required on the final part of repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.48pm on 4th December 2020.
